game.name: Crafters Heaven
game.shortDescription: Crafters Heaven is a lowpoly RPG sandbox adventure blending survival, crafting, and exploration. Build your base, fight wild creatures, and discover an open world full of secrets! You can support me by wishlisting :) <3 Demo coming soon!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Crafters Heaven is a lowpoly RPG sandbox adventure blending survival, crafting, and exploration. Build your base, fight wild creatures, and discover an open world full of secrets! You can support me by wishlisting :) <3 Demo coming soon!
